name: format
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ip_geo_location_and_ip_reputation.
Tool description: This API will provide geo location data such as: country, Region, City, Latitude, Longitude, Time Zone, Zip Code, Flag and much more...Also provides: IP Blacklist, Currencies, Languages, TLD, Host,  and more...
API description: Retrieve and return data in the specified format from the IP Geo Location and IP Reputation API.

format.description: The format to display data. Can be either "json" or "xml". Defaults to "json".
